description: Parks were a lifeline for many during lockdown - yet many of us take them for granted. This virtual walk looks at the history of parks in Southwark paying tribute to the pioneers who fought to provide open space to the public.

events.name: Virtual Tour: Amazing Parks by Ruth Polling
events.notes: Please book on the Open House website and you will be sent the link in advance of the session

factsheet.heading: Longer description
paragraphs: Parks were a lifeline for many Londoners during lockdown and yet one many of us take for granted. To celebrate parks and their importance to local communities this walk takes a look at the history of parks in Southwark and pays tribute to the pioneers who fought to provide open space to the public.
Led by Ruth Polling a London Blue Badge Tourist Guide who has a particular interest in 19th and 20th century social history.

name: Celebrating workplaces of key workers: Amazing Parks - a virtual tour with a London Blue Badge Tourist Guide
